main.name: Aurélien Vandaële
main.description: Motivated and passionate, I've been studying computer science for 3 years and I've been freelancing for 2
main.bio: I'm a french student and freelancer. To stop talking about professional things, I'm sportive, one of my goal is to do an Iron Man (a kind of triathlon).

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: School of expertise in computer science
education.description: I learned IT thanks to this school. It taught me how to learn. Learning C/C++, Python, React, DevOps (Git, Docker, Ansible)

education.degree: French high school diploma equivalent in Science
education.description: This school permitted me to study Mathematics and Physic Science, 2 hobbies for me

work.description: Completion of various projects such as the automation of logo manufacturing (completion of SVG in Pick&Place format). Mostly made in Python. Discovery of telework.

work.title: Second year internship - Fullstack developper
work.description: First real discovery of work as developper. Designer and developper of an application for decision-making purposes. Discovered web development (Back: Python/SQL, Front: ReactJS and Superset framework)

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

testimonials.text: Pedagogical, educated, hard-working, Aurélien has many qualities for the realization of your projects.
Highly motivated to succeed, he knows how to work in a group and get really involved in his projects.
